Name: Ship Destroyed
Description: The ship the character was serving on was lost, destroyed during a mission, and the character was one of the few who survived.

Actions.Description: The character gains a Focus, which should reflect the character’s experiences. Examples include: Extra Vehicular Operations, Small Craft, or Survival.

Name: Death of a friend
Description: During an important mission, one of the character’s friends was killed in action.

Actions.Description: The character gains a Focus, which should reflect the character’s experiences. Examples include: Counselling, but it may also represent a skill or pursuit the character takes up in their fallen friend’s memory or to prevent the same thing happening in the future.

Name: Lauded by another culture
Description: The character was involved in a mission that earned the official praise of a non-Federation culture; they are now considered to be a friend to that people.

Actions.Description: The character gains a Focus, which should reflect the character’s experience with that culture. A Focus of X Culture, replacing the X with the name of that culture, is a good example, as would any that represent skills or techniques specific to that culture.

The character may gain a Trait, which should reflect this event. A good example might be Friend to the X, replacing the X with the name of the culture. This reflects the character’s renown amongst that culture, and the benefits and problems such status brings.

Name: Negotiate a Treaty
Description: The character was part of a delegation that helped negotiate a treaty, agreement, or alliance with a culture outside the Federation.

Actions.Description: The character gains a Focus, which should reflect the character’s experience with the negotiations. Examples include: Diplomacy, Negotiation, or Galactic Politics.

Name: Required to take Command
Description: During a mission, a crisis left the mission’s leader unable to lead. This required the character to take command, something they may not have been prepared for.

Actions.Description: The character gains a Focus, which should reflect the character’s experiences during the crisis. Examples include: Lead by Example, Inspiration, or Composure.

Name: Encountered a truly Alien Being
Description: The character encountered a life-form which is truly alien, something barely within the comprehension of humanoid life. It might have been some godlike entity, or a creature that swims through space, but whatever it was, it was not life as we know it.

Actions.Description: The character gains a Focus, which should reflect the character’s experiences with the entity. Examples include: Empathy, Philosophy, Xenobiology

Name: Serious Injury
Description: The character was seriously hurt, and needed to spend a considerable amount of time recovering.

Actions.Description: The character may gain a Trait, which should reflect some lasting effect of the character’s injury or the way they recovered. Examples include: Prosthetic Implant, or some form of disability.

Name: Conflict with a hostile culture
Description: The character was involved in a major battle with a hostile force, and is unlikely to forget the experience.

Actions.Description: The character gains a Focus, which should reflect skills they honed during the fighting. Examples include: Hand Phasers, Hand-to-Hand Combat, or Shipboard Tactical Systems.

Name: Mentored
Description: A highly-respected officer took notice of the character’s career. For a time, the character served as the officer’s pilot and aide, gaining the benefit of the officer’s experiences and lessons.

Actions.Description: The character gains a Focus, reflecting the lessons learned. Examples include: Composure or Etiquette, though any Focus reflecting the officer’s specialities would be fitting.

Name: Transporter Accident
Description: The character suffered some manner of strange accident while using a Transporter.

Actions.Description: The character gains a Focus, which should reflect something they learned either because of the accident, or in the aftermath. Examples include: Transporters & Replicators, Small Craft, or Quantum Mechanics.

Name: Dealing with a plague
Description: The character’s starship was assigned to provide aid to a world deal with an epidemic.

Actions.Description: The character gains a Focus, which should reflect how they helped during the crisis. Examples include: Infectious Diseases, Emergency Medicine, or Triage.

Name: Betrayed Ideals for a Superior
Description: The character was placed in a situation where they had to choose between a trusted superior and their own ideals, and chose to follow the superior.

Actions.Description: The character gains a Focus, reflecting the event and its aftermath. Examples include: Persuasion, Inspiration, Investigation.

Name: Called out a Superior
Description: The character was placed in a situation where they had to choose between a trusted superior and their own ideals, and chose to follow their ideals.

Actions.Description: The character gains a Focus, reflecting the event and its aftermath. Examples include: Uniform Code of Justice, History, or Starfleet Protocol.

Name: New Battle Strategy
Description: In combat with a hostile force, the character devised a new strategy or tactic.

Actions.Description: The character gains a Focus, reflecting their decisive battlefield leadership. Examples include: Combat Tactics, Hazard Awareness, or Lead by Example.

Name: Learns Unique Language
Description: The character encounters a species with an unusual form of communication, and learns to communicate with them.

Actions.Description: The character gains a Focus, reflecting what the character learned from the event. Examples include: Linguistics, Cultural Studies, or Negotiations.

Name: Learns Unique Language
Description: The character encounters a species with an unusual form of communication, and learns to communicate with them.

Actions.Description: The character gains a Focus, reflecting the event and its aftermath. Examples include: Ancient Technology, Computers, Reverse Engineering.

Name: Special Commendation
Description: The character encounters a species with an unusual form of communication, and learns to communicate with them.

Actions.Description: The character gains a Focus, reflecting the event and its aftermath. Examples include: Athletics, Survival, or Emergency Medicine.

Name: Solved an Enginnering Crisis
Description: The character was instrumental in ending a crisis caused by malfunctioning technology, and saved many lives in the process.

Actions.Description: The character gains a Focus, reflecting the technology involved in the event. Examples include: Electro-Plasma Power Systems, Fusion Reactors, or Warp Engines.

Name: Breakthrough or Invention
Description: The character made an important technological discovery, devised a new way of using a particular technology, or invented some new technology that will be invaluable in the future.

Actions.Description: The character gains a Focus, reflecting the character’s achievement. Examples include: Experimental Technology, Invention, or Improvisation.

Name: First Contact
Description: The character was chosen to be involved in one of the most important of Starfleet’s missions: first contact with another culture.

Actions.Description: The character gains a Focus, reflecting the character’s achievement. Examples include: Experimental Technology, Invention, or Improvisation.
